t: Security in Amazon Location Service - Amazon Location Service

t: r/amazonprime on Reddit: Amazon Logistics definition of a "secure location"
s: June 27, 2020 - My front door. To be fair, most Amazon drivers deliver to the door as well but things have gone down hill over the past few months. I'm sure volume and new drivers from the pandemic play into it but in no universe would that be considered a secure location by anyone.

t: Best practices: Securing your Amazon Location Service resources | Amazon Web Services
s: April 1, 2022 - Location data is subjected to heavy scrutiny by security experts. Knowing the current position of a person, vehicle, or asset can provide industries with many benefits, whether to understand where a current delivery is, how many people are inside a venue, or to optimize routing for a fleet ...

t: Pickup Locations - Amazon Customer Service
s: Instead of having a package delivered to your home or business address, you can select a pickup point. You can choose to deliver eligible packages to pickup locations such as Amazon Locker, Amazon Counter, or UPS AccessPoints™ Locations.

t: Safety & Security | Amazon.com
s: Shop through a wide selection of Safety & Security at Amazon.com. Free shipping and free returns on Prime eligible items.

t: Ship to a Pickup Location - Amazon Customer Service
s: Once the address is in your address book, select Ship to this address during checkout. For the option to appear, all items in your order must be eligible for delivery to a pickup location.

t: Report a Security Issue - Amazon Customer Service
s: To report a security vulnerability on Amazon Retail services or products: Submit the details of your findings through the web form, or visit the Amazon Vulnerability Research Program page on the HackerOne website: https://hackerone.com/amazonvrp (available in English only)

t: Pickup Location Eligibility - Amazon Customer Service
s: Items shipped or returned to a Pickup Location need to meet certain guidelines.

t: Order to a Pickup Point - Amazon Customer Service
s: Select a pickup point as your preferred shipping address during Checkout or when adding a new address in Your Account.

t: Amazon Locker - Amazon Customer Service
s: Amazon Locker provides you with a self-service delivery location to collect your Amazon.com packages.

t: Amazon Delivery Location Selection Overview for Business Accounts - Amazon Customer Service

t: Is Amazon safe? Pro tips for secure shopping | IPVanish

t: Location-Based Service - Amazon Location Service - AWS
s: 4 days ago - Amazon Location Service is a location-based service that lets developers add location functionality, such as maps, points of interest, geocoding, routing, tracking, and geofencing, to their applications.

t: Amazon left my package "in a secure place"! | DIS Disney Discussion Forums - DISboards.com
s: So, I did not know Amazon has its own delivery service now. Tracking said something like AMZL US for the delivery instead of UPS or post office. When I ordered I could have driven 20 minutes to Whole Foods for 1 day delivery, or wait for 2 day to my house. When it didn't arrive by 8 PM as...
